name: Fall for Halloween
description:
** Play the WebGL version directly in your browser here**
https://simmer.io/@miphisto55/fall-for-halloween

Every young witch needs to one day perform "The Fall" before they're allowed to go out on their first Halloween! Dodge the incoming enemies, and shoot them down for points. Impress your mom and the coven with your witch skills!

Controls:
W,A,S,D to move the witch
Hold Left Click to shoot.

Gameplay:
A magical enchantment has been placed on you causing you to fall against your ability to fly! Every time an enemy hits you, the magical enchantment increases your speed. The faster you fall, the faster you hit the ground! Try to avoid getting hit as to get as many points as possible by collecting power ups, destroying enemies, and lasting longer!

Just as the young witch hits the ground, the magical enchantment saves them by teleporting their body to the top of the mountain to perform the Fall again until their performance satisfies the witch coven!
